mc.name: Balance
mc.oracleText: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.
mc.printedText: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

mc.name: Channel
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

mc.name: Strip Mine
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
mc.flavorText: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominaria itself a casualty of war.

mc.name: Berserk
mc.oracleText:
Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.
mc.printedText:
Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

mc.name: Serendib Efreet
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

mc.name: Gifts Ungiven
mc.oracleText: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Sensei's Divining Top
mc.oracleText:
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

mc.name: Goblin Lackey
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: At the first sign of enemy scouts, Jula grinned and strapped on his diplomacy helmet.

mc.name: Kird Ape
mc.oracleText: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
mc.printedText: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
mc.flavorText: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts--but context is everything.

mc.name: Lotus Petal
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

mc.name: Mystical Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.printedText: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.flavorText: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.

mc.name: Necropotence
mc.oracleText:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
mc.printedText:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

mc.name: Skullclamp
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +1/-1.
Whenever equipped creature is put into a graveyard, draw two cards.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +1/-1.
When equipped creature is put into a graveyard, draw two cards.
Equip {1}
mc.flavorText: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

mc.name: Trinisphere
mc.oracleText: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {2}{B} to cast instead.)
mc.printedText: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast.
mc.flavorText: Designed to restrain petty thoughts, but used to repress entire empires.

mc.name: Tinker
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to cast Tinker, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to cast Tinker, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: "What separates us from mere beasts is the capacity for self-improvement."
